title: Symmetric polynomials: DIM integrable systems versus twisted Cherednik systems
summary: We discuss interrelations between eigenfunctions of the Hamiltonians associated with the commutative (integer ray) subalgebras of the Ding-Iohara-Miki algebra and those of the twisted Cherednik system. In the case of $t=q^{-m}$ with natural $m$, eigenfunctions of the first system of Hamiltonians are the twisted Baker-Akhiezer functions (BAFs) introduced by O. Chalykh, while eigenfunctions of the twisted Cherednik Hamiltonians are twisted non-symmetric Macdonald polynomials. Actually, the twisted Cherednik ground state is symmetric and coincides with a peculiar symmetric BAF. We lift this correspondence to excited states, and claim that both Cherednik eigenfunctions and BAF's can be combined to produce symmetric functions, which coincide with each other and are eigenfunctions of the both DIM Hamiltonians and power sums of the twisted Cherednik Hamiltonians at once. This reflects the correspondence between the DIM algebra and the spherical DAHA explicitly.

AI.tldr: 该论文探讨了Ding-Iohara-Miki代数整数射线子代数哈密顿量的本征函数与扭曲Cherednik系统本征函数之间的相互关系，建立了DIM代数与球面DAHA之间的对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究Ding-Iohara-Miki(DIM)代数的可交换子代数哈密顿量与扭曲Cherednik系统哈密顿量本征函数之间的内在联系，揭示这两个数学结构之间的深层对应关系。
AI.method: 通过分析当t=q^{-m}（m为自然数）时的特殊情况，将扭曲Baker-Akhiezer函数与扭曲非对称Macdonald多项式联系起来，并将这种对应关系从基态推广到激发态。
AI.result: 发现扭曲Cherednik基态是对称的，与特定的对称Baker-Akhiezer函数重合；两种系统的本征函数可以组合产生对称函数，这些对称函数同时是DIM哈密顿量和扭曲Cherednik哈密顿量幂和的本征函数。
AI.conclusion: 建立了DIM代数与球面双仿射Hecke代数(DAHA)之间的明确对应关系，揭示了两个不同数学结构本征函数系统之间的深刻联系。

title: Knot invariants from XC-structures on the Sweedler algebra are trivial
summary: An XC-algebra is the minimum algebraic structure needed to define a framed, oriented knot invariant and generalises Lawrence's invariant obtained from ribbon Hopf algebras. In this note, we show that the knot invariant produced by any XC-structure on the Sweedler algebra is completely determined by the framing of the knot. Furthermore, we also exhibit explicit families of XC-structures on the Sweedler algebra that do not have a ribbon Hopf-algebraic origin.

AI.tldr: XC-代数产生的纽结不变量仅由纽结的框架决定，且存在非源于ribbon Hopf代数的XC结构
AI.motivation: 研究XC-代数（推广了Lawrence从ribbon Hopf代数获得的纽结不变量）在Sweedler代数上的结构，探索其产生的纽结不变量的性质
AI.method: 在Sweedler代数上构造XC结构，分析这些结构产生的纽结不变量，特别关注其与纽结框架的关系
AI.result: 发现Sweedler代数上任何XC结构产生的纽结不变量完全由纽结的框架决定；构造了明确的非源于ribbon Hopf代数的XC结构族
AI.conclusion: XC-代数在Sweedler代数上的应用揭示了纽结不变量与框架的紧密联系，并展示了XC结构比ribbon Hopf代数结构更广泛的存在性

title: Representations of quantum symmetric pairs at roots of unity
summary:
Let $θ$ be an involution of a complex semisimple Lie algebra $\mathfrak{g}$ and $(\mathrm{U}_v,\mathrm{U}^\imath_v)$ be the associated quantum symmetric pair at an odd root of unity $v$. In this paper, generalizing the approach of De Concini-Kac-Procesi for quantum groups, we study the structures and irreducible representations of the iquantum group $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$.
  We establish a Frobenius center of $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$ as a coideal subalgebra of the Frobenius center of the quantum group $\mathrm{U}_v$. Via a quantum Frobenius map, we show that the Frobenius center of $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$ is isomorphic to the coordinate algebra of a Poisson homogeneous space $\mathcal{X}$ of the dual Poisson-Lie group $G^*$. We define a filtration on $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$ such that the associated graded algebra is $q$-commutative. Using this filtration, we show that the full center of $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$ is generated by the Frobenius center and the Kolb-Letzter center, and we determine the degree of $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$. We show that irreducible representations of $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$ are parametrized by $θ$-twisted conjugacy classes. We determine the maximal dimension of those irreducible representations, and show that the dimension of an irreducible representation is maximal if the corresponding twisted conjugacy class has maximal dimension. We also study the branching problem for irreducible $\mathrm{U}_v$-modules when restricting to $\mathrm{U}^\imath_v$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在奇根单位元处的量子对称对(U_v, U^ı_v)的结构和不可约表示，建立了U^ı_v的Frobenius中心，证明了其与泊松齐次空间坐标代数的同构，确定了中心结构，并研究了不可约表示的参数化和维数性质。
AI.motivation: 量子群在奇根单位元处的表示理论已有深入研究，但对应的量子对称对（iquantum群）的结构和表示理论尚未充分发展。本文旨在将De Concini-Kac-Procesi对量子群的方法推广到iquantum群，系统研究U^ı_v的结构和表示理论。
AI.method: 1. 建立U^ı_v的Frobenius中心作为量子群U_v的Frobenius中心的余理想子代数；2. 通过量子Frobenius映射，证明Frobenius中心与泊松齐次空间坐标代数的同构；3. 在U^ı_v上定义滤过，使得相伴分次代数是q-交换的；4. 利用此滤过研究中心结构和度数；5. 研究不可约表示的参数化和维数性质；6. 研究U_v-模到U^ı_v的限制分支问题。
AI.result: 1. 建立了U^ı_v的Frobenius中心结构；2. 证明了Frobenius中心与泊松齐次空间坐标代数的同构；3. 确定了U^ı_v的完整中心由Frobenius中心和Kolb-Letzter中心生成；4. 确定了U^ı_v的度数；5. 证明了不可约表示由θ-扭共轭类参数化；6. 确定了不可约表示的最大维数，并证明了维数最大当且仅当对应的扭共轭类维数最大；7. 研究了U_v-模到U^ı_v的限制分支问题。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将De Concini-Kac-Procesi对量子群的方法推广到iquantum群，系统建立了在奇根单位元处量子对称对的结构和表示理论，包括中心结构、不可约表示的参数化和维数性质，以及分支问题的研究，为量子对称对的表示理论提供了完整的框架。

title: On the gauge invariance of the Kuperberg invariant of certain high genus framed 3-manifolds
summary: We show that the Kuperberg invariant of the Weeks manifold with any framing is a gauge invariant of finite-dimensional Hopf algebras, which provides the first example of gauge invariants of general finite-dimensional Hopf algebras via hyperbolic 3-manifolds. We also show that the Kuperberg invariant of the 3-torus is gauge invariant, which further supports the idea of systematically producing gauge invariants of Hopf algebras via topological methods proposed in \cite{CNW25}.

AI.tldr: 本文证明Weeks流形和3-环面的Kuperberg不变量是有限维Hopf代数的规范不变量，为通过拓扑方法系统构造Hopf代数规范不变量提供了首个双曲3-流形实例。
AI.motivation: 探索通过拓扑方法系统构造有限维Hopf代数规范不变量的可能性，特别是利用双曲3-流形来产生这类不变量。
AI.method: 研究Weeks流形（双曲3-流形）和3-环面的Kuperberg不变量，分析它们在不同框架下的性质，证明这些拓扑不变量实际上是有限维Hopf代数的规范不变量。
AI.result: 1. Weeks流形在任何框架下的Kuperberg不变量都是有限维Hopf代数的规范不变量，这是通过双曲3-流形获得此类不变量的首个例子。2. 3-环面的Kuperberg不变量也是规范不变量，进一步支持了通过拓扑方法系统产生Hopf代数规范不变量的设想。
AI.conclusion: 拓扑方法特别是双曲3-流形可以有效地产生有限维Hopf代数的规范不变量，这为系统构造这类不变量开辟了新途径，并验证了先前提出的理论框架。

title: The kernel of formal polylogarithms
summary: Polylogarithmic functions (polylogs) in $n$ variables can be viewed as elements of $(U\mathfrak{p}_{m})^*$, the dual of the universal enveloping algebra of the Lie algebra $\mathfrak{p}_{m}$ of infinitesimal spherical pure braids with $m=n+3$ strands. Polylogs with $m=4,5$ are used in the theory relating double shuffle relations and Drinfeld associators \cite{furusho_double_2011}. We give explicit formulas for elements of $(U\mathfrak{p}_{m})^*$ representing polylogs, and compute the left ideal $J_{m} \subset U\mathfrak{p}_{m}$ given by their joint kernel. We introduce Lie subalgebras $\mathfrak{k}_{m}=\mathfrak{p}_{m} \cap J_{m}$, and we compute them for $m=4, 5$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究多对数函数与李代数表示的关系，给出了多对数在通用包络代数对偶中的显式公式，并计算了相关左理想和李子代数。
AI.motivation: 研究多对数函数在通用包络代数对偶中的表示，探索其与双洗牌关系和Drinfeld结合子的理论联系，为理解多对数的代数结构提供新视角。
AI.method: 将多对数视为李代数对偶空间中的元素，给出显式表示公式；计算这些元素的联合核生成的左理想；引入并计算相关的李子代数。
AI.result: 得到了多对数在(U𝔭ₘ)*中的显式公式，计算了联合核生成的左理想Jₘ，并计算了m=4,5时的李子代数𝔨ₘ=𝔭ₘ∩Jₘ的具体形式。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了多对数函数与李代数表示之间的具体联系，为理解多对数在双洗牌关系和Drinfeld结合子理论中的作用提供了代数基础。

title: Generating sets of standard modules for $D_4^{(1)}$
summary: Let $\widetilde{\mathfrak g}$ be an affine Lie algebra of type $D_4^{(1)}$ and $L(Λ)$ its standard module of level $k$ with highest weight vector $v_Λ$. We define Feigin--Stoyanovsky's type subspace as $W(Λ)=U(\widetilde{\mathfrak g}_{1})\,v_Λ$, where $\widetilde{\mathfrak g}=\widetilde{\mathfrak g}_{-1}\oplus\widetilde{\mathfrak g}_{0}\oplus\widetilde{\mathfrak g}_{1}$ is a $\mathbb{Z}$-gradation of $\widetilde{\mathfrak g}$ associated with a $\mathbb{Z}$-gradation $\mathfrak g=\mathfrak g_{-1}\oplus\mathfrak g_{0}\oplus\mathfrak g_{1}$. Using vertex operator relations, we reduce the Poincaré--Birkhoff--Witt spanning set of $W(Λ)$, and describe it in terms of difference and initial conditions. The spanning set of the whole standard module $L(Λ)$ can be obtained as a limit of the spanning set for $W(Λ)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了D4^(1)型仿射李代数的标准模L(Λ)中的Feigin-Stoyanovsky型子空间W(Λ)，通过顶点算子关系简化了其PBW生成集，并用差分和初始条件进行描述。
AI.motivation: 研究仿射李代数标准模中特定子空间的结构，特别是Feigin-Stoyanovsky型子空间，这类子空间在共形场论和可积系统中有重要应用。通过分析这类子空间的生成集，可以更好地理解标准模的整体结构。
AI.method: 使用与Z-分级相关的顶点算子关系，将仿射李代数分解为三个部分，定义Feigin-Stoyanovsky型子空间W(Λ)=U(𝔤̃₁)v_Λ。通过顶点算子关系简化PBW生成集，并用差分条件和初始条件描述该生成集。
AI.result: 成功简化了W(Λ)的PBW生成集，并用差分和初始条件进行了描述。同时发现整个标准模L(Λ)的生成集可以作为W(Λ)生成集的极限情况获得。
AI.conclusion: 论文为D4^(1)型仿射李代数标准模中的Feigin-Stoyanovsky型子空间提供了明确的生成集描述，建立了子空间生成集与整个模生成集之间的联系，为后续研究这类代数结构提供了重要工具。

title: Introduction to Quantum Entanglement Geometry
summary:
This article is an expository account aimed at viewing entanglement in finite-dimensional quantum many-body systems as a phenomenon of global geometry. While the mathematics of general quantum states has been studied extensively, this article focuses specifically on their entanglement. When a quantum system varies over a classical parameter space, each fiber may look like the same Hilbert space, yet there may be no global identification because of twisting in the gluing data. Describing this situation by an Azumaya algebra, one always obtains the family of pure-state spaces as a Severi-Brauer scheme.
  The main focus is to characterize the condition under which the subsystem decomposition required to define entanglement exists globally and compatibly, by a reduction to the stabilizer subgroup of the Segre variety, and to explain that the obstruction appears in the Brauer class. As a consequence, quantum states yield a natural filtration dictated by entanglement on the Severi-Brauer scheme.
  Using a spin system on a torus as an example, we show concretely that the holonomy of the gluing can produce an entangling quantum gate, and can appear as an obstruction class distinct from the usual Berry numbers or Chern numbers. For instance, even for quantum systems that have traditionally been regarded as having no topological band structure, the entanglement of their eigenstates can be related to global geometric universal quantities, reflecting the background geometry.

AI.tldr: 该论文从整体几何角度研究有限维量子多体系统中的纠缠现象，将纠缠视为参数空间上量子态纤维丛的扭曲，用Azumaya代数和Severi-Brauer方案描述，并证明纠缠产生的障碍体现在Brauer类中。
AI.motivation: 传统上量子态的数学研究广泛，但本文专门关注其纠缠特性。当量子系统在经典参数空间上变化时，虽然每个纤维看起来像相同的希尔伯特空间，但由于粘接数据的扭曲，可能不存在全局识别。本文旨在从整体几何角度理解纠缠现象。
AI.method: 使用Azumaya代数描述量子态在参数空间上的变化，将纯态空间族视为Severi-Brauer方案。通过约化到Segre簇的稳定子群来刻画定义纠缠所需的子系统分解全局兼容存在的条件。以环面上的自旋系统为例，具体展示粘接的全息可以产生纠缠量子门。
AI.result: 证明了纠缠产生的障碍体现在Brauer类中，量子态在Severi-Brauer方案上产生由纠缠决定的自然滤过。具体示例显示，粘接的全息可以产生纠缠量子门，并表现为不同于传统Berry数或陈数的障碍类。即使对于传统认为没有拓扑能带结构的量子系统，其本征态的纠缠也能与背景几何相关的整体几何普适量相联系。
AI.conclusion: 纠缠可以作为有限维量子多体系统中的整体几何现象来理解。通过Azumaya代数和Severi-Brauer方案的框架，纠缠产生的障碍被编码在Brauer类中，这为理解量子态在参数空间上的几何结构提供了新的视角，并揭示了纠缠与背景几何之间的深刻联系。

title: Skew brace extensions, second cohomology and complements
summary: We study extensions and second cohomology of skew left braces via the natural semi-direct products associated with the skew left braces. Let $0 \to I \to E \to H \to 0$ be a skew brace extension and $Λ_H$ denote the natural semi-direct products associated with the skew left brace $H$. We establish a group homomorphism from ${\rm H}_{Sb}^2(H, I)$ into ${\rm H}_{Gp}^2(Λ_H, I \times I)$, which turns out to be an embedding when $I \le {\rm Soc}(E)$. In particular the Schur multiplier of a skew left braces $H$ embeds into the Schur multiplier of the group $Λ_H$. Analog of the Schur-Zassenhaus theorem is established for skew left braces in several specific cases. We introduce a concept called minimal extensions (which stay at the extreme end of split extensions) of skew left braces and derive many fundamental results. Several reduction results for split extensions of finite skew left braces by abelian groups (viewed as trivial left braces) are obtained.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过自然半直积研究斜左brace的扩张与第二上同调，建立了斜左brace上同调群到群上同调群的嵌入映射，并探讨了斜左brace的极小扩张和分裂扩张。
AI.motivation: 研究斜左brace的扩张理论和上同调性质，通过自然半直积建立斜左brace与群理论之间的联系，为斜左brace的分类和结构分析提供理论工具。
AI.method: 利用斜左brace的自然半直积Λ_H，建立从斜左brace第二上同调群H_Sb^2(H,I)到群上同调群H_Gp^2(Λ_H,I×I)的群同态映射，证明在特定条件下该映射是嵌入映射。引入极小扩张概念，研究分裂扩张的约化结果。
AI.result: 证明了斜左brace第二上同调群可以嵌入到相应群的上同调群中，特别地，斜左brace的Schur乘子嵌入到群Λ_H的Schur乘子中。建立了斜左brace的Schur-Zassenhaus定理的类比，获得了有限斜左brace通过阿贝尔群分裂扩张的多个约化结果。
AI.conclusion: 通过自然半直积方法成功建立了斜左brace扩张理论与群上同调理论之间的深刻联系，为斜左brace的分类和结构研究提供了新的工具和视角，所得结果推广了经典群论中的相关理论到斜左brace框架。
